channel.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
channel.description: Lets see these comments keep going, they're funny as hell lol. I enjoy reading all of them.

item.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

KroniKz_:

alcohol is drug? O_O

You serious!? Drunk drivers kill so many more people than any drug I’ve ever heard of. It’s the oldest drug we got lol. It’s what people turn to instead of drugs so they can tell themselves “Well at least im not doing drugs”.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

rip4d:

I feel like marijuana is illegal mainly because it has many medical benefits and the government could make a lot of money off of it, yet they can’t control the growth of it, so they make it illegal just because they can’t get a hold of all of it (like kids who have bf3 servers and ban people who are better than them). Just my opinion on the matter.

Yes and no. Marijuana (hemp) has a ton of uses. It would completely disrupt many companies that have the government in their pockets, not just the medical industry.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:60, topic:447973”]I don’t understand the logic about marijuana and alcohol.

When I smoke a doobie, or take a fat toke out of a bong and I’m completely stoned. I can still make conscious decisions and I still have a sense of whats going on around me. Whereas when I’m drunk, I can’t remember what happened past 8:30 that night.[/quote]

That’s because you drank to much. Another nasty side effect of Alcohol is the “hang over” the next day.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

KroniKz_:

alcohol is drug? O_O

Alcohol is a drug. Coffee (caffeine) is a drug. Medication are drugs. When you are getting “drunk” you are really getting “high” but without the social stigma, thats why we change the word around to make it seem ok for us.

But really it’s not ok for us, because alcohol is one of the more dangerous/deadly drugs out there. 37,000 deaths every year in the USA are attributed to alcohol use alone. Nobody has ever died from marijuana. Alcohol also damages the brain/brain cells like many drugs. Alcohol causes cancer, while there has never been a documented case of cancer from marijuana. Alcohol is so addictive that addicts can get seizures or even die, if they don’t get their fix. Alcohol instigates violent behavior, marijuana does not.

So when people who slam a case of beer every weekend try to tell me I am doing wrong by smoking weed, I can only laugh. Now if anyone can tell me, why the hell are people going to jail over this stuff? Why the hell are we giving all this money to organized crime, instead of regulating it like alcohol?

I try not to post in these topics but they are always tempting >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs, Drugs, and More DRUGS!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:40, topic:447973”]K. I’m going to actually CONTRIBUTE to this thread!

K. So my drug of choice: Alchohol.

K. So my story was like this.

I was chillin at my crib after a hard 5 hour day at the office. My bro calls me up and he’s like, bro, what you tryn to do tonight? I’m like, i’m tryn to blow of some steam nigga haha. He was like, ight’ ima come and scoop you at your crib be there in like 15 minutes.

[center][size=18pt]15 minutes later
[/size][/center]

K. So I roll up to my bro’s crib and it’s just me an him. He tells me that some biddies bout to roll up in a bit. (like 9pm right now way past my bedtime :eek:). His roommate rolls through with a handle of platinum vodka and 2 cases of budlight (nasty shit :(). I’m like 'ight a handle of platinum, I’ll be straight for tonight. Keep in mind before this my bro drank like 7 beers. He grabs a shot glass and opens a can of budlight. He’s like, I’m gnna pour you a shot and then you chase it with a swig of budlight. So after 4 shots and 2 cans of budlight, i’m feeling mighty good. So by this time 1 biddie rolls up and like 5 of my bros friends showup. Now there is like 3 cases of budlight, 1 case of budweiser, and a handle of vodka. So I’m buzzing hard right now, so I go and take 4 more shots and sip on another can of budlight. I start playing beer pong. I was playing teams and I was teamed with the girl vs these other two dudes. She explains to me that if we don’t make a ping pong ball into the cup we’ll have to strip down and run around the neighborhood. Luckily I make one and we play for 30 mor eminutes. The whole time my bro is feeding me beer after beer. I lost count. It’s about 10:30pm right, so I decide to go outside and smoke a cig with a bunch of other people. I tell this dude that I can design websites and stuff and he’s like, that’s sick bro. I go to sit down and the chair breaks. I laugh really hard and can’t get up. I get up. We go back inside and everyone starts yelling at me, TACKLE HIM. I’m like WTF. So they want me to tackle this skinny kid into a bean bag chair. I’m, like okay. II hit my head hard on a bedstand. I roll over and start laughing. Then I chill for like an hour. btw, this whole time I,m sipping on budlight. I sit down and the room starts spinning. This guy hands me a trashcan and I puke all inside it. My bro then carries me into the room and I fall asleep. I wake up at 6 in the morning with a pounding headache and a stomache ache. I throw up 10 times throughout that morning, take a shower and a motrin and I feel better.

Don’t listen to people who say you forget stuff when you are drunk. I remember EVERYTHING.

hate/rate/appreciate[/quote]
alcohol is drug? O_O

Read full topic
